title: Physics in the world around us
creator_credit: Lily Steiner and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: Designed to encourage high school students to continue with physics studies. Looks at five different areas of physiscs, explains the basic principles and their relevance to daily life, future technology and job prospects.
